Government
Township Council

Agendas & Minutes
Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.
[View Most Recent Agendas, Minutes and Bill Lists](https://www.twp.washington.nj.us/government/township_council/agendas_and_minutes.php)

Members

* [Peter Del Borrello, III- Council President](https://www.twp.washington.nj.us/government/township_council/peter_del_borrello_iii-_councilman.php)

**Contact Us**
Clerk's Office
523 Egg Harbor Road
Sewell, NJ 08080
Phone: 856-589-0520
Fax: 856-589-9177

Christine Ciallella
Municipal  Clerk
856-589-0520 ext. 2214
[cciallella@twp.washington.nj.us](mailto:cciallella@twp.washington.nj.us "cciallella@twp.washington.nj.us")
Township Council Meetings held every 2nd and 4th Wednesday of the month at 6pm.
\*Dates are subject to change. Council meeting dates may change during summer months.
Please consult the Township Calendar on the Home Page for exact dates and information.

Monday - Friday
8:30 am - 4:30 pm

Closed Fridays
